fields.text: Welcome to GoDaddy, your trusted B2B web hosting provider based in San Francisco.
For new hosting plans and pricing, please press '[INDEX]'.
To explore our shared hosting packages, please press '[INDEX]'.
To learn about our dedicated server solutions, please press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to a shared hosting specialist.
Please hold while we connect you to a dedicated server specialist.
For billing support and account inquiries, please press '[INDEX]'.
For invoice and payment questions, please press '[INDEX]'.
For account upgrades and renewals, please press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to billing support for invoices and payments.
Please hold while we connect you to an account renewal specialist.
